article.name: Space Battle a1
article.description: A test I made to see if loaded images could be rotated through different angles using Processing. I want to create a turned based fluid motion battle model, eventually with firing arcs and stuff, but at this stage I intend to work on speed/max turning angle, giving the user a set of choices to decide which direction to send their vessel.
article.keywords: test java p5 processing loaded images rotated angles create turned based fluid motion battle model stage speed turning angle choices direction vessel
